sentences: Christopher Robin Duesterdiek is a Canadian Production sound mixer.
He is best known for his work on The Snow Walker (2003), Elysium (2013), The Interview (2014) and The Revenant  (2015).
In 2016, he received an Academy Award for Best Sound Mixing nomination at the 88th Academy Awards for his work on The Revenant.
2014: Night at the Museum: Secret of the Tomb (sound mixer)
This American Housewife (production sound mixer – 1 episode)
2010: Tucker and Dale vs. Evil (sound mixer)
The Vampire Diaries (production sound mixer – 1 episode)
Da Vinci's City Hall (TV Series) (production sound mixer – 13 episodes)
Terminal City  (TV Series) (production sound mixer – 10 episodes)
Cold Squad (TV Series) (production sound mixer – 6 episodes)
Chestnut: Hero of Central Park (production sound mixer)
A Date with Darkness: The Trial and Capture of Andrew Luster (TV Movie) (sound mixer)
No Night Is Too Long (TV Movie) (sound mixer)
Deadly Little Secrets (sound mixer: second unit)
The Magician's House II (TV Short) (sound mixer)
2000: Dark Angel (production sound mixer: second unit)
